description.value: Set of codes that are needed for implementation of the DAF-Core profiles. These codes are used as extensions to the FHIR and DAF value sets.

definition.value: The patients problems as identified by the provider(s). Items on the provider’s problem list
Additional health concerns from other stakeholders which are outside the provider’s problem list.
Careplan for identifying all the people and /or organizations who plan to participate in the coordination of delivery of care.
The clinical conclusions and assumptions that guide the patient's treatment and the clinical activities formulated for a patient.
